title: HTTP/1.1 vs HTTP/2: Core Differences
excerpt: Understanding the fundamental differences between HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 protocols and their impact on web performance.

title: Multiplexing in HTTP/2
excerpt: How HTTP/2's multiplexing allows multiple requests and responses over a single TCP connection.

title: Header Compression in HTTP/2
excerpt: Exploring how HTTP/2 compresses headers to reduce overhead and improve performance.

title: Head-of-Line Blocking in HTTP/1.1
excerpt: Understanding head-of-line blocking and how it affects performance in HTTP/1.1 applications.

title: Performance Impact of HTTP/2
excerpt: How HTTP/2 significantly improves page and API performance by reducing latency and connection overhead.

title: API Design with HTTP/2
excerpt: How HTTP/2 enables fine-grained API requests without the performance penalties of HTTP/1.1.

title: Request Batching in HTTP/1.1
excerpt: Understanding why request batching and resource bundling were necessary in HTTP/1.1.

title: Granular Endpoints with HTTP/2
excerpt: How HTTP/2 rewards clean, granular endpoints and frequent client-server interaction.

title: Migration from HTTP/1.1 to HTTP/2
excerpt: Best practices and considerations when migrating applications from HTTP/1.1 to HTTP/2.
